contentList:
Drive a disorienting spike of psychic energy into the mind of a creature, possibly imposing a -[1] penalty to its next Saving Throw. Peform a minor magical trick that can clean or soil creatures and surfaces, light or snuff out small fires, and create musical notes. Prestidigitation: Soil Instantly soil a creature with dirt or create a small muddy surface. Light a candle or torch. Can also ignite flammable surfaces. Snuff out a small fire on a weapon, candle, torch, or surface. Elementalism Exert control over the elements. Beckon Air Seize air and compel it to possibly push a creature up to [1] or an object up to [2] away from you. %%% Push Creature %%% Push Object %%% Distraction Beckon Earth: Sculpt Beckon Earth: Destroy Beckon Fire: Sculpt Beckon Fire: Extinguish %%% Bonfire %%% Create a harmless bonfire that emits light for [1]. %%% Bonfire %%% Brighten an area in a [1] radius. %%% Bonfire %%% Shouldn't see this. Beckon Water: Freeze Manipulate a water surface and freeze it to become an ice surface. Beckon Water: Ice Block Manipulate a water surface to change its shape and freeze it into a block of ice. Beckon Water: Move Manipulate a water surface to move to a different location. Absorb Elements Absorb incoming elemental energy, lessening its effect on you and store it for your next melee attack. Take half damage from the next elemental attack targetting you, and deal an additional [1] of that element type on your next attack. Absorb Elements Absorb incoming elemental energy, lessening its effect on you and store it for your next melee attack. Take half damage from the next elemental attack targetting you, and deal an additional [1] of that element type on your next attack. Absorb Elements: Acid The affected entity is Resistant to Acid damage and deals an additional [1] the next time it deals damage with a weapon. Absorb Elements: Cold The affected entity is Resistant to Cold damage and deals an additional [1] the next time it deals damage with a weapon. Absorb Elements: Fire The affected entity is Resistant to Fire damage and deals an additional [1] the next time it deals damage with a weapon. Absorb Elements: Lightning The affected entity is Resistant to Lightning damage and deals an additional [1] the next time it deals damage with a weapon. Absorb Elements: Thunder The affected entity is Resistant to Thunder damage and deals an additional [1] the next time it deals damage with a weapon. Beast Bond Grants a friendly or charmed beast Advantage on Attack Rolls against creatures within [1] of you. Beast Bond Affected entity has Advantage on Attack Rolls against creatures within [1] of the bonded target. Beast Bond Bonded beast has Advantage on Attack Rolls against creatures within [1] of you that you can see. Catapult Retrieve a light object from the ground and launch it at a creature. Cause Fear Awaken the sense of mortality in a creature, possibly Frightening it. The affected creature repeats the Saving Throws at the end of its turns. Ceremony Perform one of many beneficial religious ceremonies. Ceremony: Atonement Touch a creature, granting it Advantage on Ability Checks and Saving Throws using Wisdom.

At the end of each turn, the target must pass a DC 20 Wisdom Saving Throw or take [1]. Atonement Has Advantage on Ability Checks and Saving Throws using Wisdom.

Must pass a DC 20 Wisdom Saving Throw at the end of each turn or take [1]. Ceremony: Bless Water Touch a container of water in a creature's inventory, causing it to become Holy Water. Ceremony: Coming of Age Touch a humanoid creature, granting it a +[1] bonus to Ability Checks. Coming of Age Gains a +[1] bonus to Ability Checks. Ceremony: Dedication Touch a humanoid creature, granting it a +[1] bonus to Saving Throws. Dedication Gains a +[1] bonus to Saving Throws. Ceremony: Funeral Rite Perform funeral rites for a corpse. Ceremony: Wedding Touch two humanoid creatures, bonding them together in marriage. For the next [1] days, each target gains +[2] to their Armor Class while they are within [3] of each other. Wedding Vows Happily Married!

For the next [1] days, gain +[2] to your Armor Class while within [1] of your partner. Earth Tremor Cause a tremor in the ground, miring the area around yourself in thick mud and possibly knocking nearby creatures Prone. Frost Fingers Freezing cold blasts from your fingertips. Silvery Barbs Force an enemy to reroll a successful Attack Roll or Saving Throw. Can't be used again while still affected by Silvery Barbs. Silvery Barbs: Distract Force an enemy to reroll their Attack Roll or Saving Throw. Then gain the ability to give a friendly creature advantage on their next Attack Roll, Ability Check or Saving Throw. Silvery Barbs: Advantage Give a friendly creature Advantage on their next Attack Roll or Saving Throw. Silvery Barbs: Luck Can grant one nearby friendly creature Advantage on their next Attack Roll or Saving Throw.

Removed after usage. Snare Place a magical trap that captures enemies that walk within [1] of it. It is triggered when a Small or larger creature moves near it, possibly causing all nearby creatures to be knocked Prone and become Restrained Restrained creatures make Dexterity Saving Throws with Disadvantage at the end of their turns, ending the effect on a success. Another creature can Help them to end the effect as well. Snare The snare activates when stepped on by an enemy and traps them. Snare Trapped Tasha's Caustic Brew Cover a creature in corrosive acid for as long as you maintain Concentration, dealing [1] at the start of each of the creatures turns. Caustic Brew Takes [1] at the start of their turn. Zephyr Strike Move like the wind, allowing you to avoid provoking Opportunity Attacks. Until the spell ends, you have Advantage on the next weapon Attack Roll which deals an additional [1]. Hit or miss, you gain an additional [2] of Movement Speed until the end of that turn. Zephyr Strike Can move without provoking Opportunity Attacks. %%% Zephyr Strike Force Damage Zephyr Strike: Dash Movement speed is increased by [1]. Aganazzar's Scorcher Roaring flame emanates from you in a line, dealing [1] to all creatures caught in its path. Borrowed Knowledge Draw on knowledge from spirits of the past and become Proficient in one skill you lack proficiency in. Draw on knowledge from spirits of the past and gain Proficiency in [1] if you're not already proficient. Borrowed Knowledge: Athletics Borrowed Knowledge: Acrobatics Borrowed Knowledge: Sleight of Hand Borrowed Knowledge: Stealth Borrowed Knowledge: Arcana Borrowed Knowledge: History Borrowed Knowledge: Investigation Borrowed Knowledge: Nature Borrowed Knowledge: Religion Borrowed Knowledge: Animal Handling Borrowed Knowledge: Insight Borrowed Knowledge: Medicine Borrowed Knowledge: Perception Borrowed Knowledge: Survival Borrowed Knowledge: Deception Borrowed Knowledge: Intimidation Borrowed Knowledge: Performance Borrowed Knowledge: Persuasion Has Proficiency in [1]. Borrowed Knowledge: Athletics Borrowed Knowledge: Acrobatics Borrowed Knowledge: Sleight of Hand Borrowed Knowledge: Stealth Borrowed Knowledge: Arcana Borrowed Knowledge: History Borrowed Knowledge: Investigation Borrowed Knowledge: Nature Borrowed Knowledge: Religion Borrowed Knowledge: Animal Handling Borrowed Knowledge: Insight Borrowed Knowledge: Medicine Borrowed Knowledge: Perception Borrowed Knowledge: Survival Borrowed Knowledge: Deception Borrowed Knowledge: Intimidation Borrowed Knowledge: Performance Borrowed Knowledge: Persuasion Dragon's Breath Imbue an ally with the power to spew magical energy from their mouth. Dragon's Breath: Acid Imbue an ally with the power of a black dragon's acid breath. Dragon's Breath: Cold Imbue an ally with the power of a white dragon's frost breath. Dragon's Breath: Fire Imbue an ally with the power of a red dragon's fire breath. Dragon's Breath: Lightning Imbue an ally with the power of a blue dragon's lightning breath. Dragon's Breath: Poison Imbue an ally with the power of a green dragon's poison breath. Dragon's Breath: Acid Gained ability to exhale draconic acid breath. Dragon's Breath: Cold Gained ability to exhale draconic frost breath. Dragon's Breath: Fire Gained ability to exhale draconic fire breath. Dragon's Breath: Lightning Gained ability to exhale draconic lightning breath. Dragon's Breath: Poison Gained ability to exhale draconic poison breath. Acid Breath Exhale a cone of acid. Frost Breath Exhale a cone of frost. Fire Breath Exhale a cone of fire. Lightning Breath Exhale a cone of lightning. Poison Breath Exhale a cone of poison. Dust Devil %%% Dust Devil Technical Tempest When the dust devil is tempestuous, it deals [1] to nearby creatures and pushes them [2] away. Example_Text_Block
